links.title: Company Overview
links.content:
[ Skip to content](#content "Skip to content")

[![Tantech Holdings Ltd \(TANH\)](https://tanhtech.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/cropped-logo-148x81.png)](https://tanhtech.com/)

[![Tantech Holdings Ltd \(TANH\)](https://tanhtech.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/cropped-logo-148x81.png)](https://tanhtech.com/)

Main Menu

## Add

## Company Overview 

Tantech Holdings Ltd. was founded in 2002 and went public on the NASDAQ stock exchange through an IPO in 2015, with the stock symbol TANH.

Tantech Holdings Ltd. holds over 40 patents and has been awarded one second-class prize for China’s National Scientific and Technological Progress. It has also received multiple science and technology awards and honors from Zhejiang Province and Jiangsu Province in China.

With a foundation rooted in “a business created by a single bamboo,” Tantech Holdings Ltd. adheres to the concept of “low-carbon energy, healthy living.” The company specializes in the production of bamboo-based environmentally friendly disposable food and beverage products, bamboo charcoal products, barbecue charcoal series, and invests in specialized vehicles for new energy.

The company develops bamboo-based fully degradable environmentally friendly paper-plastic disposable food and beverage products using bamboo and sugarcane pulp as base materials. Through a marketing model combining online platforms and offline physical sales in the United States, Canada, and other locations, it focuses on the research, development, promotion, and sales of degradable environmentally friendly paper-plastic products with the U.S. market as its core, striving to become a green solutions provider in the paper-plastic industry.

The carbon product series offered by the company covers four major categories: clean home, purification and deodorization, outdoor barbecue, and plant nutrition. It includes more than 100 products such as kitchen and bathroom cleaners, bamboo charcoal, activated carbon, barbecue charcoal, water pipe charcoal, bamboo vinegar liquid, and plant growth agents. Carbon Doctor is widely recognized as an expert in “odor elimination and purification.” Its products are popular in China, Japan, South Korea, the Middle East, and other regions.

The company also invests in new energy vehicles and has the manufacturing capacity to produce 5,000 new energy vehicles per year. It is listed as a product enterprise in the announcement catalog of China’s Ministry of Industry and Information Technology. The product range includes over 10 models of buses, mini busses, logistics vehicles, sanitation vehicles, and others, covering areas such as tourism, leisure, clean sanitation, express logistics, and civil services. The company’s developed Tornado non-contact high-speed garbage cleaning vehicle was used for the clean-up work around the main venue of the 2016 G20 Hangzhou Summit.

Tantech Holdings Ltd. has established its corporate headquarters in Washington, DC, USA, further realizing the internationalization of the company and creating better value for its shareholders.

## Company Overview

[Download](https://tanhtech.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/碳博士控股PPT-eng-20230728定-1.pptx "Company Overview")

links.title: Board of Directors
links.content:
[ Skip to content](#content "Skip to content")

[![Tantech Holdings Ltd \(TANH\)](https://tanhtech.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/cropped-logo-148x81.png)](https://tanhtech.com/)

[![Tantech Holdings Ltd \(TANH\)](https://tanhtech.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/cropped-logo-148x81.png)](https://tanhtech.com/)

Main Menu

## Add

## Board of Directors 

The following members make up the **Tantech Holdings Ltd (TANH**) Board of Directors. Please select an individual member below to learn more about them and the committees they contribute to.

Name |  Age |  Position(s)  
---|---|---  
Zhengyu Wang |  56 |  Chairman of the Board, and Director  
Yefang Zhang |  58 |  Director  
Mengqi Liao |  30 |  Independent Director  
Hongdao Qian |  61 |  Independent Director  
Shudong Wang |  74 |  Independent Director  
  
**Zhengyu Wang****Chairman of Board of Directors**

Mr. Wang Zhengyu has more than 20 years of experience in R&D and manufacturing operations in the field of integrated bio-resource utilization. In 2005, he founded the Zhejiang Forasen China Bamboo Technology Ltd. And he has been the Chairman of the Board of Directors of Tantech Holdings Ltd. since 2010, and successfully promoted the listing of Tantech Holdings Ltd. on NASDAQ in 2015. Mr. Wang has been adhering to the concept of “low carbon energy, healthy life”, focusing on the research and development and comprehensive utilization of biological resources. He has also participated in the research and development of more than 70 patents, some of the projects participated in the research and development of the Chinese National Science and Technology Progress Award and other awards.

**Yefang Zhang****Director**

Yefang Zhang has been in leadership roles for over a dozen years. She then helped to found Forasen Group Co., Ltd in October 2002 and has served as a Board member since then. Since July 2015, she has been Chairwoman and CEO of Farmmi, Inc., another Nasdaq listed company. From 1997 until 2002, she worked as General Manager at Zhejiang Forasen Food Co., Ltd. From 1994 to 1997, she served as Vice GM of Lishui Jingning Huali Co., Ltd. From 1991 to 1994, she was a teacher at Wenzhou Huangtan Middle School. From 1990 to 1994, she served on the board of Lishui Farmer’s Economic Committee. In addition to her efforts with our Company, Ms. Zhang also manages the business operations of Forasen Group, a company she owns with her husband and our director and Chief Executive Officer, Mr. Zhengyu Wang. Forasen Group is a PRC company with several subsidiaries that are engaged in a variety of businesses, including without limitation rubber trading, mushroom sales, biomass power generation, and marketing. She earned her Bachelor’s Degree in Geography from Wenzhou Teacher’s College in July 1991. We have appointed Ms. Zhang to be the director due to her strong understanding of our industry and business.

**Mengqi Liao****Director (Independent)**

Ms. Liao is a senior engagement manager at Pan-China Certified Public Accountants where she serves on the audit teams in the audits of financial statements of various public companies listed both in China and foreign stock exchanges. She was a manager with Da Hua Certified Public Accountants from July 2018 to March 2022. From January 2016 to June 2018, she was an auditor at Ruihua Certified Public Accountants. Ms. Liao is a certified public accountant and a certified tax agent in China. She also received the Chinese intermediate level accountant qualifications. Ms. Liao has participated in the audits of the financial statements of a number of pubic companies in connection with their financial reporting compliance with U.S. and Chinese stock exchange rules and IPOs in Hong Kong and Korea stock exchanges. Ms. Liao earned a Bachelor’s degree in Management from Chongqing Technology and Business University in 2016.

**Hongdao Qian****Director (Independent)**

Hongdao Qian has been our director since 2014. He has been a Professor on the faculty of the Guanghua Law School at Zhejiang University since September 2005. His research, writing and teaching focuses on corporate governance, economic analysis of law and Western jurisprudence. Prior to joining Guanghua Law School, Mr. Qian was a Professor at the Institute of Law, China Academy of Social Sciences; a Lecturer in Economics at Peking University and a Prosecutor in the People’s Procuratorate of Zhejiang Province. Mr. Qian was a visiting scholar at Waseda University in Japan, Stanford University in California and both Oxford and Cambridge Universities in England. Since July 2017, he has been an independent director of Farmmi, Inc, another Nasdaq listed company. He currently serves as Vice Chairman of the Chinese Society of Comparative Law, Executive Subeditor of the China Academic Yearbook and President of the China Rule of Law Research Institute, where he has organized a team of scholars to create China’s first Rule of Law index using empirical methods. Mr. Qian earned his bachelor of law from Jilin University in 1986, his master of law from North-West University of Politics and Law in 1994 and his doctor of law from Peking University in 1997. We have chosen Mr. Qian to serve on our Board of Directors because of his expertise in economics and law.

**Shudong Wang****Director (Independent)**

Shudong Wang has been our director since 2014. He was the department director at the China National Bamboo Research Center from 1996 through his retirement in 2012. He earned his bachelor’s degree in forestry from Northeast Forestry University in Heilongjiang in 1976. He once served as deputy director of Bamboo Branch of the Academic Committee of China Forestry. He has also served as executive director of South-South Cooperation Association and the Center of China International Exchange. He is a science advisor to the State Forestry Bureau. We selected Mr. Wang to serve on our Board of Directors because of his expertise in the bamboo industry in China.
